name: Accelerate
story_text: To your ally, it seems as though the world has slowed down.
effect:
The target shifts up to a number of squares equal to your Reason score.

The target can use a maneuver.

name: Again
story_text: You step back a split second to see if things play out a little differently.
trigger_text: The target makes an ability roll.
effect: You can use this ability after seeing the result of the triggering roll. The target must reroll the power roll and use the new roll.

name: Awe
story_text: You project psionic energy out to a creature and take on a new visage in their mind.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + P psychic damage; I < WEAK, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 6 + P psychic damage; I < AVERAGE, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 9 + P psychic damage; I < STRONG, frightened (save ends)

effect: If you target an ally, they gain temporary Stamina equal to three times your Presence score, and they can end one effect on them that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn. If you target an enemy, you make a power roll.

name: Choke
story_text: You crush a foe in a telekinetic grip.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + R damage; M < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 5 + R damage; M < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 8 + R damage; M < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

effect: You can vertical pull the target up to 2 squares. If the target is made restrained by this ability, this forced movement ignores their stability.

name: Entropic Bolt
story_text: You advance an enemy's age for a moment.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 + P corruption damage; P < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 3 + P corruption damage; P < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 5 + P corruption damage; P < STRONG, slowed (save ends)

effect:
The target takes an extra 1 corruption damage for each additional time they are targeted by this ability during the encounter.

You gain 1 clarity when you obtain a tier 2 or tier 3 outcome on the power roll.

name: Feedback Loop
story_text: Creating a brief psychic link between an enemy and their target gives that foe a taste of their own medicine.
trigger_text: The target deals damage to an ally.
effect: The target takes psychic damage equal to half the triggering damage.

name: Flashback
story_text: The target is thrown several seconds back through time and gets to do it all again.
effect:
The target uses an ability with a base Heroic Resource cost of 7 or lower that they've previously used this round, without needing to spend the base cost. Augmentations to the ability can be paid for as usual.

You take 1d6 damage and are slowed (save ends).

name: Hoarfrost
story_text: You blast a foe with a pulse of cold energy.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 + R cold damage; M < WEAK, slowed (EoT)
tier_effects.tier2: 4 + R cold damage; M < AVERAGE, slowed (EoT)
tier_effects.tier3: 6 + R cold damage; M < STRONG, slowed (EoT)

effect: You are slowed until the end of your next turn. Additionally, a target slowed by this ability is restrained instead.

name: Incinerate
story_text: The air erupts into a column of smokeless flame.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 fire damage
tier_effects.tier2: 4 fire damage
tier_effects.tier3: 6 fire damage

effect:
A column of fire remains in the area until the start of your next turn. Each enemy who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes 2 fire damage.

The size of the cube increases by 2, but the fire disappears at the end of your turn.

name: Inertia Soak
story_text: Your psionic energy surrounds the target and pushes everything else away from them.
effect:
The target ignores difficult terrain and takes no damage from forced movement until the start of your next turn. Whenever the target enters a square while under this effect, they can push one adjacent creature up to a number of squares equal to your Reason score. When pushing an ally, the target can ignore that ally's stability. A creature can only be force moved this way once a turn.

You are weakened (save ends). While you are weakened this way, whenever you are force moved, the forced movement distance gains a +5 bonus.

name: Iron
story_text: The target's skin turns to hard, dark metal, impenetrable and dense.
effect:
The target's stability increases by an amount equal to your Reason score, and they gain 10 temporary Stamina and 2 surges. This stability increase lasts until the target no longer has temporary Stamina from this ability.

You can't use maneuvers (save ends).

name: Kinetic Grip
story_text: You lift and hurl your foe away from you.

tier_effects.tier1: Slide 2 + R
tier_effects.tier2: Slide 4 + R
tier_effects.tier3: Slide 6 + R; prone

effect: You must vertical push the target instead of sliding them.

name: Kinetic Pulse
story_text: The force of your mind hurls enemies backward.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 psychic damage
tier_effects.tier2: 5 psychic damage; push 1
tier_effects.tier3: 7 psychic damage; push 2

effect: The size of the burst increases by 2, and you are bleeding until the start of your next turn.

name: Materialize
story_text: You picture an object in your mind and give it form—directly above your opponent's head.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + R damage
tier_effects.tier2: 5 + R damage
tier_effects.tier3: 8 + R damage

effect:
A worthless size 1M object drops onto the target to deal the damage, then rolls into an adjacent unoccupied space of your choice. The object is made of wood, stone, or metal (your choice).

The object explodes after the damage is dealt, and each creature adjacent to the target takes damage equal to your Reason score. You also take damage equal to your Reason score that can't be reduced in any way.

name: Mind Spike
story_text: A telepathic bolt instantly zaps a creature's brain.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 + R psychic damage
tier_effects.tier2: 4 + R psychic damage
tier_effects.tier3: 6 + R psychic damage

effect: The target takes an extra 2 psychic damage. You also take 2 psychic damage that can't be reduced in any way.

name: Minor Telekinesis
story_text: Wisps of psychic energy ripple visibly from your brain as you force the target to move using only your mind.
targets: Self or one size 1 creature or object
effect:
You slide the target up to a number of squares equal to your Reason score.

The size of the creature or object you can target increases by 1 for every 2 clarity spent.

You can vertical slide the target.

name: Optic Blast
story_text: Your eyes emit rays of powerful enervating force.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 + R damage; M < WEAK, prone
tier_effects.tier2: 4 + R damage; M < AVERAGE, prone
tier_effects.tier3: 6 + R damage; M < STRONG, prone

effect:
When targeting an object with a solid reflective surface or a creature carrying or wearing such an object (such as a mirror, an unpainted metal shield, or shiny metal plate armor), you can target one additional creature or object within 3 squares of the first target.

You gain 1 surge that you can use immediately, and you take damage equal to your Reason score that can't be reduced in any way.

name: Perfect Clarity
story_text: You clear the mind of nothing but the goal.
effect:
Until the start of your next turn, the target gains a +3 bonus to speed, and they have a double edge on the next power roll they make. If the target obtains a tier 3 outcome on that roll, you gain 1 clarity.

You take 1d6 damage, and you can't use triggered actions (save ends).

name: Precognition
story_text: You give a target a glimpse into the future so that they're ready for what comes next.
effect: Ability rolls made against the target take a bane until the start of your next turn. Whenever the target takes damage while under this effect, they can use a triggered action to make a free strike against the source of the damage.

name: Remote Assistance
story_text: An ally gains the benefit of your intellect.
effect:
The next ability roll an ally makes against the target before the start of your next turn gains an edge.

You target one additional creature or object.

name: Repel
story_text: They aren't going anywhere, but you might!
trigger_text: The target takes damage or is force moved.
effect: The target takes half the triggering damage, or the distance of the triggering forced movement is reduced by a number of squares equal to your Reason score. If the target took damage and was force moved, you choose the effect. If the forced movement is reduced to 0 squares, the target can push the source of the forced movement a number of squares equal to your Reason score.

name: Smolder
story_text: Smoke flows from your enemy like tears as their skin begins to blacken and flake.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + R damage; R < WEAK, the target has weakness 5 (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 6 + R damage; R < AVERAGE, the target has weakness 5 (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 9 + R damage; R < STRONG, the target has weakness equal to 5 + your Reason score (save ends)

effect: Choose the damage type and the weakness for this ability from one of the following: acid, corruption, or fire. The target takes damage before this ability imposes any weakness.

name: Spirit Sword
story_text: You form a blade of mind energy and stab your target, invigorating yourself.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + P damage
tier_effects.tier2: 6 + P damage
tier_effects.tier3: 9 + P damage

effect:
You gain 1 surge.

The target takes an extra 3 damage. You also take 3 damage that can't be reduced in any way.

name: Applied Chronometrics
story_text: Time slows down around you. Your heartbeat is the only gauge of the extra moments you've gained.

tier_effects.tier1: You target two creatures, one of which can be you.
tier_effects.tier2: You target three creatures, one of which can be you.
tier_effects.tier3: You target four creatures, one of which can be you.

effect:
Until the start of your next turn, each target gains a +5 bonus to speed, they can't be made dazed, and they can use an additional maneuver on their turn. If a target is already dazed, that condition ends for them.

Your speed is halved until the end of the encounter.

name: Gravitic Burst
story_text: Everyone get away from me!

tier_effects.tier1: 3 damage; vertical push 2
tier_effects.tier2: 6 damage; vertical push 4
tier_effects.tier3: 9 damage; vertical push 6

effect: The size of the burst increases by 1, and you are weakened until the end of your turn.

name: Levity and Gravity
story_text: You raise the target slightly into the air, then smother them against the ground.

tier_effects.tier1: 6 + R damage; M < WEAK, prone
tier_effects.tier2: 10 + R damage; M < AVERAGE, prone
tier_effects.tier3: 14 + R damage; M < STRONG, prone and can't stand (save ends)

effect: You take half the damage the target takes.

name: Overwhelm
story_text: You overload their senses, turning all their subconscious thoughts into conscious ones.

tier_effects.tier1: 6 + R psychic damage; I < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 10 + R psychic damage; I < AVERAGE, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 14 + R psychic damage; I < STRONG, dazed (save ends)

effect: You start crying, and you can't use triggered actions or make free strikes until the end of the target's next turn.

name: Slow
story_text: Perhaps they wonder why everyone else is moving so quickly?

tier_effects.tier1: The target's speed is halved (save ends), or if P < WEAK, the target is slowed (save ends).
tier_effects.tier2: The target is slowed (save ends), or if P < AVERAGE, the target's speed is 0 (save ends).
tier_effects.tier3: The target is slowed (save ends), or if P < STRONG, the target's speed is 0 (save ends).

effect:
A target can't use triggered actions while their speed is reduced this way.

The potency of this ability increases by 1 and you take 1d6 damage. At the start of each combat round while any target is affected by this ability, you take 1d6 damage. You can end the effect on all affected targets at any time (no action required).

name: Synaptic Override
story_text: You control an enemy's nervous system. How pleasant for them.

tier_effects.tier1: The target makes a free strike against one enemy of your choice.
tier_effects.tier2: The target shifts up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice.
tier_effects.tier3: The target moves up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice.

effect:
You control the target's movement. The target can't be moved in a way that would harm them (such as over a cliff), leave them dying, or result in them suffering a condition or other negative effect. However, you can move them to provoke opportunity attacks.

You take 1d6 damage and are weakened until the end of your turn.

name: Fling Through Time
story_text: You hurl the target through the annals of time, forcing them to witness every moment of their existence all at once.

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + P corruption damage; P < WEAK, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 5 + P corruption damage; the target is flung through time, and if P < AVERAGE, they are weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 8 + P corruption damage; the target is flung through time, and if P < STRONG, they are weakened (save ends)

effect:
A target who is flung through time is removed from the encounter map until the end of their next turn, reappearing in their original space or the nearest unoccupied space.

You take 2d6 damage and permanently grow visibly older (the equivalent of 10 years for a human). If you obtain a tier 3 outcome on the power roll, you gain 2 clarity.

name: Force Orbs
story_text: Spheres of solid psionic energy float around you.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 damage
tier_effects.tier2: 3 damage
tier_effects.tier3: 5 damage

effect:
You create three size 1T orbs that orbit your body. Each orb gives you a cumulative damage immunity 1. Each time you take damage, you lose 1 orb.
Once on each of your turns, you can use a free maneuver to fire an orb at a creature or object within 5 squares as a ranged strike, losing the orb after the strike.

You create five orbs, and you are weakened while you have any orbs active.

name: Reflector Field
story_text: A protective field reverses the momentum of incoming attacks.
effect:
The aura lasts until the start of your next turn. Whenever an enemy targets an ally in the area with a ranged ability, the ability is negated on the ally and reflected back at the enemy. The ability deals half the damage to the enemy that it would have dealt to the ally and loses any additional effects.

The size of the aura increases by 1. Whenever your aura reflects an ability, you take 2d6 damage and forget a memory, as determined by you and the Director.

name: Soul Burn
story_text: You blast their soul out of their body, leaving it to helplessly float back to a weakened husk.

tier_effects.tier1: 6 + P damage; P < WEAK, dazed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 10 + P damage; P < AVERAGE, dazed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 14 + P damage; P < STRONG, dazed (save ends)

effect:
The target takes a bane on Presence tests until the end of the encounter.

The potency of this ability increases by 1. You take 2d6 damage and gain 3 surges that you can use immediately.

name: Exothermic Shield
story_text: You encase the target in psionic flame and allow them to flicker without fear of burning out.
effect:
Until the start of your next turn, the target has cold immunity 10 and fire immunity 10, and their strikes deal extra fire damage equal to twice your Reason score. Additionally, whenever an enemy uses a melee ability against the target while they are under this effect, the enemy takes 5 fire damage.

The target gains 2 surges. You are weakened and slowed (save ends).

name: Hypersonic
story_text: You move fast enough to turn around and watch your foes feel the aftermath.

tier_effects.tier1: 12 sonic damage
tier_effects.tier2: 18 sonic damage
tier_effects.tier3: 24 sonic damage

effect:
You teleport to a square on the opposite side of the area before making the power roll.

If you obtain a tier 2 outcome or better, you are slowed until the end of your turn and each target is slowed until the end of their turn.

name: Mind Snare
story_text: You latch onto your prey's brain and don't let go, like a song they can't get out of their head.

tier_effects.tier1: 10 + R psychic damage; R < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 14 + R psychic damage; R < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 20 + R psychic damage; R < STRONG, slowed (save ends)

effect:
While slowed this way, the target takes 3 psychic damage for each square they willingly leave.

While slowed this way, the target instead takes 5 psychic damage for each square they willingly leave. You have a double bane on ability rolls made against the target while they are slowed this way.

name: Soulbound
story_text: You fire a piercing bolt of psychic energy that lances through two foes and leaves a faint intangible thread between them.

tier_effects.tier1: 8 damage; A < WEAK, the target is stitched to the other target (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 13 damage; A < AVERAGE, the target is stitched to the other target (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 17 damage; A < STRONG, the target is stitched to the other target (save ends)

effect:
If any target becomes stitched to the other, both targets are stitched together. While stitched together, a target takes a bane on power rolls while not adjacent to a creature they're stitched to. Whenever a stitched target takes damage that wasn't dealt by or also taken by another stitched target, each other stitched target takes half the damage the initial target took.

You target yourself and three enemies instead.

name: Fate
story_text: Your foe gets a glimpse of how it will end for them.

tier_effects.tier1: 8 + P psychic damage
tier_effects.tier2: 13 + P psychic damage
tier_effects.tier3: 17 + P psychic damage

effect:
The target has damage weakness 5 until the end of your next turn. Whenever the target takes damage while they have this weakness, they are knocked prone.

This ability gains the Strike keyword as the vision hurts the target's psyche. You make a power roll, then are weakened (save ends).

name: Gravitic Well
story_text: You bend gravity into a fine point and pull your foes toward it.
targets: Each creature and object in the area

tier_effects.tier1: 6 damage; vertical pull 5 toward the center of the area
tier_effects.tier2: 9 damage; vertical pull 7 toward the center of the area
tier_effects.tier3: 13 damage; vertical pull 10 toward the center of the area

effect:
Targets closest to the center of the area are pulled first.

The size of the area increases by 2. You also target yourself and each ally within distance.

name: Greater Kinetic Grip
story_text: You raise the target into the air without breaking a sweat.

tier_effects.tier1: Slide 4 + R; M < WEAK, the forced movement is vertical
tier_effects.tier2: Slide 8 + R; M < AVERAGE, the forced movement is vertical
tier_effects.tier3: Slide 12 + R; prone; M < STRONG, the forced movement is vertical

effect: The forced movement ignores stability. You take 2d6 damage and are weakened (save ends).

name: Psi Boost
effect:
Whenever you use an ability that is a main action or a maneuver with the Psionic keyword, you can spend additional discipline to apply a psi boost to it and enhance its effects. A psi boost's effects only last until the end of the turn which the ability is first used. You can apply multiple psi boosts to an ability, but only one instance of each specific boost. You can use the following psi boosts.

##### Dynamic Power (1 Clarity)
If the ability force moves a target, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Reason score.
##### Expanded Power (3 Clarity)
If the ability targets an area, you increase the size of the area by 1. If the area is a line, you increase the size of one dimension, not both.
##### Extended Power (1 Clarity)
If the ability is ranged, the distance gains a bonus equal to your Reason score. If the ability is melee, the distance gains a +2 bonus.
##### Heightened Power (1 Clarity)
If the ability deals rolled damage, it deals extra damage equal to your Reason score.
##### Magnified Power (5 Clarity)
If the ability has a potency, you increase that potency by an amount equal to your Reason score.
##### Shared Power (5 Clarity)
If the ability targets individual creatures or objects, you target one additional creature or object within distance.
##### Sharpened Power (1 Clarity)
If the ability has any power roll, that roll gains an edge.

name: Stasis Field
story_text: Keep everything as it was. Ignore everything that will be.
targets: Each creature and object in the area

tier_effects.tier1: P < WEAK, the target is slowed until the effect ends
tier_effects.tier2: P < AVERAGE, the target's speed is 0 until the effect ends
tier_effects.tier3: P < STRONG, the target is restrained until the effect ends

effect:
The area is frozen in time until the start of your next turn. Each object in the area is restrained and can't fall until the effect ends. Until the effect ends, creatures in the area who are reduced to 0 Stamina or would die stay alive, and objects in the area that are reduced to 0 Stamina remain undestroyed.
Make a power roll that targets each enemy in the area.

Any creature or object force moved in the area takes 2 corruption damage for each square of the area they enter. Creatures and objects restrained in the area can be force moved. You are restrained until the effect ends.

name: Synaptic Conditioning
story_text: It's a subtle mindset shift. It's not that they're your enemy—you just don't like them!

tier_effects.tier1: 10 psychic damage; the target takes a bane on ability rolls made to harm you or your allies (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 14 psychic damage; the target has a double bane on ability rolls made to harm you or your allies (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 20 psychic damage; the target considers you and your allies to be their allies when using abilities and features (save ends)

effect: While the target is under this effect, you no longer consider your enemies to be your enemies when using your abilities and features.

name: Synaptic Dissipation
story_text: You manipulate your enemies' minds and make them wonder if you were ever really there in the first place.

tier_effects.tier1: Two creatures
tier_effects.tier2: Three creatures
tier_effects.tier3: Five creatures

effect:
You target a number of creatures with this ability determined by the outcome of your power roll. You and your allies are invisible to each target until the start of your next turn.

The effect ends early if you take damage from an enemy's ability.

name: Doubt
story_text: You tug at the strings of the foe's anima and unravel them, allowing someone else to take advantage of their drive.

tier_effects.tier1: 10 + P damage; P < WEAK, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 14 + P damage; P < AVERAGE, weakened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 20 + P damage; P < STRONG, weakened and slowed (save ends)

effect:
This ability gains an edge against a target with a soul (see *[Draw Steel: Monsters](https://mcdm.gg/DS-Monsters)*). After you make the power roll, you or one ally within distance have a double edge on the next power roll you make before the end of the encounter.

You feel dispirited until you finish a respite. If you obtain a tier 3 outcome on the power roll, you and the target each have damage weakness 5 (save ends).

name: Levitation Field
story_text: You manipulate the air around your allies so they can move as freely through the sky as you can.
effect:
Each target can fly until the start of your next turn, and can immediately shift up to their speed. You can also shift up to your speed. While flying, a target's stability is reduced to 0 and can't be increased.

The effects last for 1 hour instead.

name: Mindwipe
story_text: You attempt to make them forget all their training.

tier_effects.tier1: 12 + R damage; R < WEAK, the target takes a bane on their next power roll
tier_effects.tier2: 17 + R damage; R < AVERAGE, the target takes a bane on power rolls (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 23 + R damage; R < STRONG, the target has a double bane on power rolls (save ends)

effect:
The target can't communicate with anyone until the end of the encounter.

You take 3d6 damage.

name: Rejuvenate
story_text: You reshape the flow of time in the target's body to return it to an earlier state.
effect:
Choose two of the following effects:
- The target can spend any number of Recoveries.
- The target gains 1 of their Heroic Resource, and can end any effects on them that are ended by a saving throw or that end at the end of their turn.
- The target gains 2 surges, and gains a +3 bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.

You and the target both permanently grow visibly younger (the equivalent of 20 human years, to the minimum of an 18-year-old). Additionally, you are weakened and slowed (save ends).

name: Stasis Shield
story_text: You freeze time just long enough to bring the victim to safety!
targets: Self, or one creature or object
effect:
The target is teleported to an unoccupied space adjacent to you, taking no damage and suffering no additional effects if this movement would get them out of harm's way.

You can't target yourself, and you take the damage and any additional effects instead of the target.

name: Steel
story_text: The target's skin becomes covered in tough metal.
effect:
The target has damage immunity 5 and can't be made slowed or weakened until the start of your next turn. Whenever the target force moves a creature or object while under this effect, the forced movement distance gains a +5 bonus.

You can't use maneuvers (save ends).

name: Acceleration Field
story_text: You forcibly stuff more moments into a critical point in time, knowing full well you might need to steal some of your own.

tier_effects.tier1: 4 corruption damage; slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 6 corruption damage; slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 10 corruption damage; slowed (save ends)

effect:
Each target can use any main action available to them as a free triggered action, but they lose their main action on their next turn.

Make a power roll that targets you and each enemy within distance.

name: Borrow From the Future
story_text: You lean on future heroism to assist you in the now.
effect: The targets share 6 of their Heroic Resource among themselves, as you determine. A target can't gain more than 3 of their Heroic Resource this way. After using this ability, you can't gain any clarity until the end of the next combat round.

name: Fulcrum
story_text: You precisely manipulate the creatures around you.
targets: Each enemy and object in the area

tier_effects.tier1: 2 burst
tier_effects.tier2: 3 burst
tier_effects.tier3: 4 burst

effect:
Make a power roll to determine the area of this ability. Each target is vertical pushed 6 squares. You can target only objects of size 1L or smaller.

You can choose to reduce the size of the burst by 2 (to a minimum of 1 burst) to give the forced movement distance a +2 bonus. You take half the total damage all targets take from forced movement.

name: Gravitic Nova
story_text: Unbridled psionic energy erupts from your body and flashes outward, hurling your foes back.
targets: Each enemy and object in the area

tier_effects.tier1: 6 damage; push 7
tier_effects.tier2: 9 damage; push 10
tier_effects.tier3: 13 damage; push 15

effect:
On a critical hit, the size of the area increases by 3, and this ability deals an extra 10 damage.

You are weakened (save ends). If you scored a critical hit with this ability, you die.

name: Resonant Mind Spike
story_text: You fire a telepathic bolt empowered by every consciousness within reach directly into your foe's mind.

tier_effects.tier1: 15 + R psychic damage
tier_effects.tier2: 24 + R psychic damage
tier_effects.tier3: 28 + R psychic damage

effect:
This ability ignores cover and concealment.

The ability roll scores a critical hit on a natural 17 or higher. You take half the damage the target takes, and you can't reduce this damage in any way.

name: Synaptic Terror
story_text: You project a terrifying image into the brains of your foes, and their fear psionically invigorates your allies.
targets: Each ally and enemy in the area

tier_effects.tier1: R < WEAK, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: R < AVERAGE, frightened (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: R < STRONG, frightened (save ends)

effect:
You and each target ally can't obtain lower than a tier 2 outcome on power rolls until the start of your next turn. Each target enemy is affected by the ability's power roll.

You can't use this ability if doing so would cause you to have negative clarity.
